name: T.O.T.E. - The Tales of the Elements Demo
name_original: T.O.T.E. - The Tales of the Elements Demo
description:
The Tales of the Elements (T.O.T.E. for short) is a 2D top-down Japanese-style Role-Playing Game (JRPG) similar to games like Crusader of Centy or Secret of Mana. The difference between TOTE and those other games is that it puts a HEAVY emphasis on Hip Hop and its culture! 

The Story:

In Polyphony, Hip Hop was once a great culture that thrived until it reached it’s “Golden Age.” Soon after, however, The Evil Industry took over the world and forced those who practiced the elements of TRUE Hip Hop into hiding for many years. 

BeNeVoLeNcE and Mega Ran along with their friends decide to take it upon themselves to restore the 4 Elements of Hip-Hop. The story of TOTE follows their adventures as they journey into the heart of the Darkness that was brought about by the Music Industry!

Play the demo of this enhanced re-release here or play the original version on Steam:

 Tales of the Elements on Steam (steampowered.com)

FAQ:

"My computer is saying that the file is harmful." 

It's not. There are no viruses included with the games files or anything like that. 

"An error saying I need a dx9.dll file keep popping up so the game's not working!"

Make sure you have directx9 or higher installed on your PC. 

"I can't save my game at saving points." 

Make sure to run the game as administrator. Saving the game doesn't work otherwise.

"I'm having issues with..." 

For any bug reports or issues, please email me at lastbenevolence@outlook.com!
